hero.title: Grow on <LinkedIn>LinkedIn</LinkedIn> with deeplinks
hero.description: The only short links that opens your contents in the right mobile apps, driving more conversion and growth. They provide a seamless user experience.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.heading: You're losing conversions
problem.description: Every time your links open a mini-browser integrated into a social network or an app, you're losing conversions because the user experience is poor.

more.description1: No one wants to be trapped in a mini-browser integrated into an app (like LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitch, ...). Your visitors don't either.
more.description2: Users are frustrated for many reasons, including social accounts disconnection, payment processors not working, etc. Most people abandon before subscribing or buying.
more.description3: Traditional links create friction in the user journey, damaging your reputation and reducing engagement rates.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.heading: Share pim.ms deeplinks today
solution.description: <logo>PIMMS</logo> detects which app should open your link and sends users directly there, creating a seamless experience that increases conversion rates.

more.description1: deeplink automatically detects the user's device and opens the link in the most appropriate mobile application.
more.description2: Visitors stay engaged since they use those apps daily and are already logged in. As a result, you get much more conversions
more.description3: Get easily the performance of your deeplinks from a real-time dashboard throughout the year.

free_offer.title: Free access to <logo>PIMMS</logo>
free_offer.description: Never lose conversions again - start with 10 free deeplinks today.
